content.raw: We just received info “Only the 20 robot configurations available in the SubT Tech Repo may be used in submissions for the Tunnel Circuit. Additional configurations, platforms, models, or sensors may not be included in a scored submission.” so there is no gimbal available now \(for moving 2D lidars\), right?
